args:
Determine whether this NHTSA investigation summary is relevant to the Washington Post. Return `{"result": true}` or `{"result": false}`
content: High Voltage Batteries May Short Circuit

Nova Bus (US) Inc. (Nova Bus) is recalling certain 2022-2023 Nova Bus LFS transit buses.  The high voltage batteries may have loose hardware that can fall inside the battery pack and create a short circuit.A short circuit increases the risk of a fire.

Number of Units Affected: 10.0
